hub.title: Indian Data Project — Government Data, Made Visible
hub.description: Interactive visualizations of Indian government data. Budget breakdowns, spending analysis, and tax calculators. Real data from official sources, made accessible for every citizen.

home.title: Union Budget 2025-26 — Indian Data Project
home.description: Interactive visualization of India's Union Budget 2025-26. See where Rs 50 lakh crore goes — revenue breakdown, ministry-wise spending, state allocations, and a personal tax calculator.

explore.title: Budget Data Explorer — Ministry-wise Spending | Indian Data Project
explore.description: Explore India's Union Budget 2025-26 ministry by ministry. Sortable data table with scheme-level detail for all government expenditure. Export to CSV.

calculator.title: Income Tax Calculator FY 2025-26 — Where Your Tax Rupees Go
calculator.description: Calculate your income tax under Old and New regimes for FY 2025-26. See exactly how your tax money is allocated across Defence, Education, Health, and other ministries.

methodology.title: Methodology — Indian Data Project
methodology.description: Data sources, tax calculation methodology, number formatting, per-capita estimates, and limitations of the Indian Data Project. Data under GODL license.
